Cards.title: One Card for all your money
Cards.description: Deck out with cards, physical or digital, splurge old-school or go digital, and jazz up their look – it's your money, your style!

Advertisement.title: It is a BIG thing
Advertisement.description: This card does it all! Spend, save, and manage your money in one app. It's like the card of the future, and you're the boss of your spending!

RevolutionizeSpending.title: Revolutionize Spending Habits with Crypto Spend
RevolutionizeSpending.description: Seamlessly utilize over 15 cryptocurrencies for transactions, whether it's at ATMs or through contactless payments, when fiat currencies aren't available in your account. Embrace the future of spending where you dictate the rules.

ImmediateControl.title: Immediate control
ImmediateControl.description: Link your card to apple or google pay in minutes and you are all set to start paying for the things you love

SecurityFeatures.title: 360° Security Features
SecurityFeatures.freezeUnfreeze: Freeze and unfreeze your card with one click
SecurityFeatures.restrictGambling: Restrict payments to gambling web sites
SecurityFeatures.onlineShopping: Get additional card for online shopping

Bundle.title: Choose the plan that fits you
Bundle.description: Discover transparent pricing options, easily compare plans, and select the one that best suits your needs. No hidden fees, just straightforward and honest pricing
